headline.main: Study of Three Mile Island Accident Finds Negligible Increase In Cancer

keywords.value: THREE MILE ISLAND PUBLIC HEALTH FUND
keywords.name: organizations

keywords.value: THREE MILE ISLAND NUCLEAR POWER PLANT
keywords.name: organizations

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: Scientists said yesterday that they had found no convincing evidence that the accident at the Three Mile Island nuclear power plant in Pennsylvania in 1979 had caused a rise in cancer rates.
docs.snippet: LEAD: Scientists said yesterday that they had found no convincing evidence that the accident at the Three Mile Island nuclear power plant in Pennsylvania in 1979 had caused a rise in cancer rates.
